home.tagline: ସ୍ମାର୍ଟ କୃଷି ଜ୍ଞାନ ସହିତ ଭାରତୀୟ କୃଷକଙ୍କୁ ସଶକ୍ତ କରିବା
home.description: ହାଇପରଲୋକାଲ ଫସଲ ପରାମର୍ଶ, ରିୟଲ୍-ଟାଇମ୍ ବଜାର ମୂଲ୍ୟ, ଅଫ୍ଲାଇନ୍ ରୋଗ ସନ୍ଧାନ ଏବଂ କୃଷି ସମ୍ବାଦ — ସବୁ ଆପଣଙ୍କର ପছନ୍ଦର ଭାଷାରେ।
home.feature1Desc: ମାଟି ଧରଣ, ଋତୁ ଏବଂ ଜଳବାୟୁ ଉପରେ ଆଧାରିତ ଜିଲ୍ଲା-ସ୍ତରର ପରାମର୍ଶ ଏବଂ ଲାଭ ଓ କ୍ଷତି ବିଶ୍ଳେଷଣ
home.feature2Desc: ସରକାରୀ MSP ତଥ୍ୟ ଏବଂ ରିୟଲ୍-ଟାଇମ୍ ବଜାର ମୂଲ୍ୟ ଯାହା ଆପଣଙ୍କୁ ଭଲ ମୂଲ୍ୟ ନେବାରେ ସାହାଯ୍ୟ କରେ
home.feature3Desc: ଆପଣଙ୍କର ଫୋନ୍ କ୍ୟାମେରା ବ୍ୟବହାର କରି ତୁରନ୍ତ ଫସଲ ରୋଗ ଚିହ୍ନଟ କରନ୍ତୁ — ଅଫ୍ଲାଇନ୍ ଭାବେ କାମ କରେ
home.feature4Desc: Available in Hindi and 8 regional languages for easy access
home.feature5Desc: ଦৈନିକ କୃଷି ସମ୍ବାଦ, ହବାମାନ ସତର୍କତା ଏବଂ ସରକାରୀ ଯୋଜନା ଅଦ୍ୟତନ
home.feature6Desc: Works without internet connection - perfect for rural areas with poor connectivity
home.ctaDescription: ଆଜି AgriSahayak ଡାଉନଲୋଡ୍ କରନ୍ତୁ ଏବଂ ହଜାର ଭାରତୀୟ କୃଷକଙ୍କ ସହଯୋଗରେ ଉତ୍ତମ ଆୟ ରୁପାୟଣ କରନ୍ତୁ।

cropAdvisory.title: ସ୍ମାର୍ଟ ଫସଲ ପରାମର୍ଶ
cropAdvisory.description: ଆପଣଙ୍କର ଅବସ୍ଥାନ, ଋତୁ ଏବଂ ମାଟି ପ୍ରକାର ଅନୁଯାୟୀ ହାଇପରଲୋକାଲ ଫସଲ ପରାମର୍ଶ ପାଆନ୍ତୁ।
cropAdvisory.riceDesc: High market demand, premium pricing. Suitable for monsoon season.
cropAdvisory.wheatDesc: Excellent yield in winter. Profitable with government MSP support.
cropAdvisory.maizeDesc: Versatile crop, good for both seasons. Multiple market uses.
cropAdvisory.pulseDesc: Nitrogen-fixing, sustainable farming. Excellent price stability.
cropAdvisory.flowerDesc: High-value crop, good oil yield. Suitable for semi-arid regions.

pricing.title: ମୂଲ୍ୟ ବୁଦ୍ଧିମତ୍ତା
pricing.description: ଭଲ ମोल ନିମନ୍ତେ ସରକାରୀ MSP ଏବଂ ବଜାର ମୂଲ୍ୟ ପରୀକ୍ଷା କରନ୍ତୁ
pricing.tip1: Always know the MSP - it's your minimum guarantee
pricing.tip2: Check prices across multiple mandis before selling
pricing.tip3: Wait for peak season for better prices
pricing.tip4: Group with other farmers for better bargaining power

disease.title: ରୋଗ ସନ୍ଧାନ
disease.description: ଆପଣଙ୍କର ଫସଲ ପତ୍ରର ଫଟୋ ନିଅନ୍ତୁ ଏବଂ ତୁରନ୍ତ ରୋଗ ପହଚାନ କରନ୍ତୁ
disease.notFound: No disease detected - Your crop looks healthy!
disease.rotationTips: Crop rotation helps prevent recurring diseases
disease.selectFromDevice: Select a photo from your device
disease.captureUsingCamera: Capture a photo using your camera
disease.tip2: Ensure good lighting for accurate detection
disease.analyzingDescription: Using AI to identify disease in your crop...
disease.errorFileSize: File size must be less than 5MB
disease.errorDetectDisease: Unable to detect disease. Please try another image.
disease.errorDetectionFailed: An error occurred during detection. Please try again.

news.title: ସମ୍ବାଦ ଏବଂ ସତର୍କତା
news.description: ନୂତନତମ କୃଷି ସମ୍ବାଦ ଏବଂ ହବାମାନ ସତର୍କତା ସହିତ ଅଦ୍ୟତନ ରୁହନ୍ତୁ
news.noNews: No news available at the moment

settings.title: ସେଟିଙ୍ଗ
settings.description: ଆପଣଙ୍କର ପREFERENCES ଏବଂ ଆପ୍ ସେଟିଙ୍ଗ୍ସ୍ ବ୍ୟବସ୍ଥାପନା କରନ୍ତୁ

footer.description: ସ୍ମାର୍ଟ କୃଷି ଜ୍ଞାନ ସହିତ ଭାରତୀୟ କୃଷକଙ୍କୁ ସଶକ୍ତ କରିବା

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your privacy matters. We store minimal data locally and never share without consent.
privacy.dataCollection: We collect image data for disease detection and store it locally on your device for offline use.
privacy.dataUse: Data is used to provide features like disease detection and is stored locally. You can delete it anytime.
privacy.contact: If you have questions, contact us at support@agrisahayak.example

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: By using AgriSahayak you agree to the terms described here.
terms.usage: The app is provided as-is for informational purposes. Use responsibly.
terms.liability: We are not liable for crop losses; recommendations are advisory.
